meanings.definition: Having lived or existed for the longest period of time.
meanings.sent1: The oldest tree in the forest stood tall and wise.
meanings.sent2: My grandma is the oldest person in our family.
meanings.sent3: The oldest cat in the neighborhood still chases mice with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent4: The oldest book in the library whispered stories of the past.
meanings.sent5: The oldest house on the street creaked with history and memories.

meanings.sent1: The oldest student in the class always had interesting stories to share.
meanings.sent2: The oldest building in town is a beautiful historical landmark.
meanings.sent3: The oldest dog in the park loves to nap in the sun.
meanings.sent4: The oldest coin in the collection gleamed with age and value.
meanings.sent5: The oldest painting in the museum captured a moment frozen in time.

meanings.definition: First in a series of items.
meanings.sent1: The oldest apple in the basket was starting to turn brown.
meanings.sent2: The oldest car in the parking lot was a classic beauty.
meanings.sent3: The oldest child in the family loved to take care of their siblings.
meanings.sent4: The oldest house on the block had a charming vintage feel.
meanings.sent5: The oldest member of the team led by example with experience and wisdom.
